summary: THERE HAVE BEEN MORE RECALLS THAN I CAN COUNT, BUT RECENTLY I WAS DRIVING IT AND THE ALTERNATOR (WHICH WAS RECALLED) WHEN OUT IN THE MIDDLE OF DRIVING AND I HAD IMMEDIATELY PULL OVER AND LOST CONTROL OF THE CAR. I'VE HAD ANOTHER RECENT RECALL NOT THE SHIFTER AND MY STEREO RANDOMLY WENT BLACK, ALLOWING NO CONTROL OVER THE VEHICLE SETTINGS OR A/C.  THIS CAR IS A LEMON!
